resources.string:
Personally identifiable information collected within this application includes:
 	- Name
 	- Email
 	- Address

All three are user-submitted upon creating an account. All personally identifiable information is stored securely within Firebase's data storage.
To read more about their privacy policy, please visit:
https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy

Data submitted is used only within this application for the purpose of improving the user experience and ensuring functionality. Data is not shared with any other application or API besides Google APIs.
To read more about Google's privacy policy please visit
https://policies.google.com/privacy
